content: And we're really giving some context to the fact that over the last couple of years, we've invested a lot of capital, many billions of dollars of capital, and that, in the fullness of time, five, six, seven years from now, those acquisitions will likely generate in the order of $12 billion of proceeds for us. And we've got operations in countries outside of the US, either where we've made investments like Modulaire, or large global businesses like Clarios, which has operations kind of across the globe and currency exposures.
